description:
Speaker: Nick Denny

Ever since I started using Python, I've used tools such as SQLalchemy, Django's ORM, and Google App Engine's NDB . They all seem to use (or perhaps abuse) a strange bit of syntactical sugar that Python provides... it's a kind of magic (methods)!

From: PyCascades 2018 in Vancouver, BC, Canada

Recorded by: Elaine at http://jollygoodrecordings.ca
title: Nick Denny It's a Kind of Magic
